entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve Reflection Handling with PublishTrimmed in .NET 9.0 #45284
  • Template Engine Tests Fail on NET 10 for Listing Templates #45283
  • Compile dotnet on mac and start the subprogram through TestFlight #45268
  • Regression from .NET 8: `dotnet run` on .NET 9 emits ANSI terminal codes when redirected #45262

Closed

  • MSIX packaging for arbitrary .NET project types #45045
  • dotnet format: "The build host could not be found" after updating VS to .NET SDK 9 #44893

PullRequests

Created

  • [backport][dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45291
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45290
    untriaged, Area-Format
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.101 December 2024 Updates #45289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Draft of guidelines for managing various kinds of breaking changes in the SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX MAIN] Update the tests to reflect the new templates. #45287
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Force overwriting packs in FileBasedInstaller when repairing Fixes #31282 #45286
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • VMR: Add Windows x86 DevVersions leg #45285
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix(cli): dotnet help new link opening #45282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump MSTest templates to 3.6.4 #45278
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24602.1 #45277
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Temporarily disable tests on AzureLinux_x64_Cross_Mono #45276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #45263
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Don't publish PrivateAssets Fixes #39400 #45259
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Log the build output when the repo build is successful but a manifest… #45281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update image to centos-stream9 #45250
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Review for breaking changes, breaking-change, Area-CLI, Area-VS, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add .json to editorconfig #45227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better search versions error experience #45144
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Pass missing compiler parameters #45257
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
